ygData.subject: Re: Why do YOU want to be a cleric?
ygData.msgSnippet: I dissagree with Allsar ! Why does everyone have low 2h blunt !? I know that with e cleric the maximum 2h blunt goes up only 4 per level not 5 like most
ygData.messageBody:
I dissagree with Allsar ! Why does everyone have low 2h blunt !? I know that
with e cleric the maximum 2h blunt goes up only 4 per level not 5 like most
abilities. But at level 19 I have maxed 2h blunt at about 75 i believe. Clerics
are the BEST soloers but they can do it easily if u know how to play. Either you
can get very strong armour and melee the enemies. Or root em and blast em away.
I just thought that at level 20 u should have a pretty high 2h blunt .


Allsar wrote:

> From: "Allsar" <bogey@...>
>
> Right now i've a recently level 20 dark elf cleric. Clerics are, and i must
> stress this, NOT soloers! Even against undead, lets say you fight an even
> level dry bone, needless to say he has a 3/4 chance of kicking your ass :)
> My role in a group consists of healing and expulsing/smiting, my melee is
> just in there for fun. Also, my two hand blunt skill is at 3 i believe, but
> since in a group youre a healer and not a tank, it is fully easy for you to
> raise your skill while not taking damage.
> Theres my 10 coppers.
> Allsar Olath`Vlos - 20th cleric - Brotherhood of the Spider - Rathe
> -----Original Message-----
> From: David Burger <david.burger@...>
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 4:50 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Why do YOU want to be a cleric?
>
> >From: "David Burger" <david.burger@...>
> >
> >Interesting point you bring up about your Elven Cleric. I played an Elven
> >Cleric up to level 11. I stopped because I was having problems raising my
> >two-handed blunt up from 0. I started a Dwarven Cleric and have seen the
> >difference. I can solo pretty good and I can definitely back a fighter if
> >needed. The problem with my first character was that I didn't have the
> >strength to do the damage and carry the gear that my Dwarf can. So I guess
> >you kind of have to make the choice to be a back up fighter in the
> >beginning. Interesting points though.
> >
> >David
> >a.k.a Doro on FenninRo
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Alvarez, Ruben (consultant) [mailto:ruben.alvarez@...]
> >Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 2:01 PM
> >To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Why do YOU want to be a cleric?
> >
> >
> >From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
> >
> >I dont think clerics can hold their own at all. (besides undead) IMHO I am
> >a level 13 High Elf cleric. Our offensive spells dont do that much damage
> at
> >all. I have read about the higher level offensive spells, and they dont
> >really impress me. I love being a cleric saving lives and getting the
> >thanks from everyone. Pretty much we cant solo. (which I dont mind at
> all)
> >I want to be in a group. When I play I must get a couple /tells an hour
> >asking me if I am in a group. Or some high level asking me to heal 500+
> >HP's. All I really want is appreciation. Depending on their level I do
> >charge a small fee for a cure or a heal. Usually what I do if they do give
> >me something depending how much, I will cure/heal the rest of the period I
> >am playing. I think everyone will agree with me that being a cleric you
> are
> >going to be poor! Like I said, I am level 13 and have about 2/5 of banded
> >armor. When I see other classes have full banded and a fine steel weapon.
> >I was forced to move locations from Oasis which doesn't give much loot at
> my
> >level to Black Burrow. I didn't mind the move at all. I plan to stay in
> BB
> >until I get full banded armor all of my level 14 spells and maybe a fine
> >steel hammer. I have to look up the stats for that. Then I will probably
> >move back to the Oasis. Well I am rambling right now plus there is work to
> >do. Safe Journeys!
> >
> >Qanin
> >The Humble Healer
> >The Rathe
> >
> >
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: David Burger [mailto:david.burger@...]
> >Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 4:47 PM
> >To: eq-clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Why do YOU want to be a cleric?
> >
> >
> >From: "David Burger" <david.burger@...>
> >
> >Let's get some content flowing on this list shall we? Let's start with why
> >you want to be a cleric.
> >
> >With me it was a simple choice. I like to be able to help people. There
> is
> >nothing like coming upon someone locked in a life or death battle and
> >swaying the tide to their side. I don't do it for any reward other than
> the
> >thank you I receive. It is good to know that you helped.
> >
> >I also like the fighting abilities of the Cleric. Although not as good as
> >the Warrior or the Paladin, Clerics can definitely hold their own.
> >
> >David
> >
> >a.k.a. Doro on FenninRo
> >
> >
